Terms and Conditions :

  1. Within 2days,please fax acknowledgement with itemized prices, prepaid/due freight charges,shipping date, weight and volume of ship-packed goods as supplier's firm acceptance of this order.
  2. Supplier shall provide dispatch information to procurement@bsiinternational.net prior to delivery of goods.
  3. Each product unit and all packages must conform with our standards as approved by our Quality Control Department.
  4. Shipping invoice must show only net pricing and the total without gross or discount amounts.
  5. Mail duplicate invoice for accounting/auditing purposes to Finance & Accounting Department.
  6. Supplier must attach a copy of this purchase order with their invoice(s) on the date of delivery.
  7. Please comply with BSI International HSE requirement as per BSI International Policy-BSI/IISM/Annexure-Rev-00.
